headline: Venezuela-driven pop in oil stocks may fade, but some gains to hold: Citi
summary: Investing.com -- Shares in oilfield services (OFS) companies rallied sharply on Monday on optimism that activity could restart in Venezuela. Citi analyst Scott Gruber cautions that the scale of the move likely overstates the underlying revenue opportunity, though part of the gains may remain.
